job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving existing AI systems for customer support rather than developing or engineering AI models. While it mentions AI training and fine-tuning, the core responsibilities are centered around application support and integrating human expertise with AI, not core AI development.

phrases: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate involvement in refining and testing AI models, which falls under the modeling category, even if it's not from scratch development.

phrases: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities
job_tasks.justification: This phrase suggests the integration of AI capabilities into existing systems or workflows, which is a software development aspect.

phrases: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to understand customer issues, evaluate AI performance in a business context, and ensure effective customer support delivery.

phrases: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities
soft_skills.justification: The aggressive ramp-up timeline and the need to integrate diverse capabilities point to a requirement for rapid learning and adaptability.

phrases: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
close the gap by improving the AI system
soft_skills.justification: The role involves troubleshooting complex issues, identifying AI limitations, and independently finding solutions, which are core to problem-solving and pragmatism.

phrases: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
soft_skills.justification: Prototyping new tools and the expectation of self-sufficiency demonstrate a need for initiative and ownership.
